message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $12,500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
